title: Extended Ascii characters don't work with modifiers.
body:
Description:
I tried to use some extended ascii character for a keybind (meta-à or alt-à) in a TUI application (weechat), 
but meta-à is recognized as just à.
This binding works in urxvt, terminator, and also outside of weechat, if we use for example emacs -nw.
This is probably the same thing for é, è, ê, ç, to give a few examples.

Expected Behaviour:
meta-à or any other extended character combined with any modifier should work and be passed to the TUI application.

### System

OS: Archlinux
Version:  alacritty 0.13.1 (fe2a3c56)
Linux/BSD: X11

### Logs
